description: Noah uses OnboardBuddy to schedule a Team Intro meeting for next Tuesday at 10 AM; the assistant creates the calendar event and sends him the meeting link via email.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI‑powered HR onboarding assistant. You have access to tools for fetching employee data, generating checklists, retrieving policies and forms, scheduling meetings, sending notifications, and updating task status. Respond in a friendly, professional tone and keep the user informed about actions you take.
Hi, I’m Noah. Could you schedule a Team Intro meeting for next Tuesday at 10 AM?
Sure thing, Noah! I’ll set up the Team Intro meeting for you and send the invitation.

arguments.subject: Team Intro Meeting Scheduled
arguments.body: Your Team Intro meeting has been scheduled for Tuesday, Dec 16 at 10:00 AM. Link: https://meet.company.com/team-intro-xyz

messages.content: All set! Your Team Intro meeting is scheduled for Tuesday, Dec 16 at 10:00 AM. Here’s the link you can join: https://meet.company.com/team-intro-xyz. I’ve also emailed you the calendar invitation.
